description:
Join Our Team

Oowlish, one of Latin America's rapidly expanding software development companies, is seeking experienced technology professionals to enhance our diverse and vibrant team.

As a valued member of Oowlish, you will collaborate with premier clients from the United States and Europe, contributing to pioneering digital solutions. Our commitment to creating a nurturing work environment is recognized by our certification as a Great Place to Work, where you will have opportunities for professional development, growth, and a chance to make a significant international impact.

We offer the convenience of remote work, allowing you to craft a work-life balance that suits your personal and professional needs. We're looking for candidates who are passionate about technology, proficient in English, and excited to engage in remote collaboration for a worldwide presence.

Our client is a leading fintech company dedicated to revolutionizing the financial service industry with cutting-edge technology and innovative solutions.

Our team is committed to delivering top-notch services to our clients, and we are seeking a skilled Nacha

Expert/Product Manager to join us on a contract basis.

As a Nacha Expert/Product Manager, you will play a critical role in managing and enhancing our ACH payment products. You will be responsible for ensuring compliance with Nacha regulations, overseeing product development, and collaborating with cross-

functional teams to deliver exceptional payment solutions. This is a contract position, and the candidate must be based in the USA.

Responsibilities

  • Product Management: Lead the development and enhancement of ACH payment products, ensuring they meet market demands and regulatory requirements.
  • Nacha Compliance: Ensure all ACH payment processes and products comply with Nacha rules and regulations. Stay up to date with any changes in Nacha guidelines and implement necessary updates.
  • Stakeholder Collaboration: Work closely with engineering, operations, compliance, and customer service teams to ensure seamless product development and deployment.
  • Market Analysis: Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify trends, opportunities, and potential product improvements.
  • Project Management: Manage product development projects from inception to launch, ensuring timely delivery and alignment with business goals.
  • Manage the day-to-day flow of inbound and outbound ACH transactions to ensure all accounting processes are balanced
  • Documentation: Create and maintain detailed product documentation, including user guides, process flows, and compliance reports.

Requirements

  • Demonstrated experience as a Product Manager with a strong emphasis on ACH payments and Nacha compliance.
  • Deep understanding of Nacha rules and the ACH payment system.
  • Strong project management, analytical, and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and collaboration abilities with cross-functional teams.
  • Location: Must be based in the USA and authorized to work in the country.

Come join us in breaking the mold and revolutionizing the tech landscape!

You Can Also Apply Here

Website: https://www.oowlish.com/work-with-us/

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/oowlish/jobs/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oowlishtechnology/
